column4: hello, when im about to install eeepc-acpi-scripts with synaptic, it wants to remove acpi-support, moonos-meta and powermanagement-interface. what are these, what do they do and is it safe to remove them? im using moonos (ubuntu based but with lxde+enlightenment instead of gnome+metacity/compiz) on an asus eee 900.
